en.ERROR_PRELOAD_CLOUD_ACCOUNT: We could not preload cloud provider data. It will be updated automatically during the next cycle.

en.SNAPSHOTS_DELETE_FAILED: Snapshots could not be deleted. Please try again.
en.HEADQUARTER_DESCRIPTION: Enter your company address in the box below.

en.SCHEDULING_FAILED: Snapshot could not be scheduled. Please try again.
en.DELETE_SNAPSHOT_SCHEDULE_SUBTITLE_1: Set the maximum age of a snapshot:
en.DELETE_SNAPSHOT_SCHEDULE_SUBTITLE_2: When do you want to perform this check?

en.CLIENTS_DISABLED_FAILED: Client could not be disabled. Please try again.
en.SNAPSHOTS_SL_NOT_SUPPORTED: Ad-Hoc snapshot creation is not supported on SoftLayer.
en.SNAPSHOTS_DELETE_SL: Ad-Hoc snapshot deletion is not supported on SoftLayer. Delete the snapshot creation schedule or modify the retention period instead.
en.SNAPSHOT_ACTIVATE_SUBTITLE: Configure the following options to activate how often backups should be performed and how many you wish to retain in a given point in time:
en.SNAPSHOTS_SL_TYPES_NOT_SUPPORTED: One or more volume types are not supported for snapshotting
en.DASHBOARD_STEP_1: This panel displays a summary of all the cloud components detected by our platform and lets you see a comparison between the resources deployed on all configured providers.
en.DASHBOARD_STEP_2: This panel displays whenever an group has one or more components down.
en.DASHBOARD_STEP_3: This panel is similar to the one above but instead of displaying the groups down, it displays the servers that are down. Remember that there may be servers that are not part of any group.
en.DASHBOARD_STEP_4: The activity stream reflects the changes the that the platform has detected and the changes that are made by the platform.
en.DASHBOARD_STEP_5: We will now visit different sections of the application that are accessible through the menu. To open the menu just click on the top left icon of your screen. Let's continue...
en.GROUPS_STEP_1: The groups page displays all of the groups configured and a few metrics on the amount of cloud items each group holds. Administrators can perform several actions (starting, stopping, scheduling, among others) by selecting one or more of them and clicking on the options button.
en.MAP_DISTRIBUTION_STEP_1: The map shows the distribution of all your cloud components around the world marked with these indicators. You can also see where you could provision additional services.
en.SCHEDULING_STEP_1: This section displays whether your servers will be turned on or off in the future. We calculate this based on the schedules you configure on our platform. You may quickly change the dates using the calendar at the right.
en.SCHEDULING_STEP_2: This list contains all the schedules configured. If you are an administrator, you have also the ability to delete any of them.
en.CUSTOMER_SETTINGS_USERS: The users tab lists all users in the system. With the appropriate permissions you are able to manage all users.
en.CUSTOMER_SETTINGS_CREDENTIALS: The credentials tab lists all configured cloud credentials that the system is using.
en.CUSTOMER_SETTINGS_HQ: The headquarters tab lets you save the headquarter location of your company.
en.SERVERS_STEP: This section lists all servers detected on the configured cloud providers. You can see specific details clicking on the View link. Depending on your permissions you are able to control the status of your servers and create schedules for them.
en.LOAD_BALANCERS_STEP: This section lists all load balancers detected on the configured cloud providers.
en.VOLUMES_STEP: This section lists all volumes detected on the configured cloud providers. These are divided by provider as volume types may differ between both.
en.SNAPSHOTS_STEP: This section lists all snapshots detected on the configured cloud providers.
en.ADMIN_DASHBOARD_STEP_1: This panel displays a summary of all the cloud items detected by our platform for all enabled clients and it lets you see a comparison between the resources deployed on all configured providers.
en.ADMIN_DASHBOARD_STEP_2: This panel is similar to the one above but shows the comparison in a different view.
en.ADMIN_DASHBOARD_STEP_3: These are the main metrics of your application.
en.ADMIN_DASHBOARD_STEP_4: The activity stream reflects the changes the platform is detecting within the configured cloud providers.
en.GETTING_STARTED_DESCRIPTION: Thanks for using the Centricity tutorial! You will need to configure your cloud provider account on Amazon or Softlayer to get started.
en.ACTIONS_DISABLED: Actions have been disabled for this component
en.PLEASE_DROP_ANY_SERVER: Please drag and drop your servers to the group
en.GROUP_CONFIG_STEP_1_NOTE: Create groups of related servers dragging them from the group servers list into group boxes. A group of servers can be started, stopped, restarted and monitored together. In the following steps you can configure the order in which each group is started and stopped. For example, a group of servers for databases can be started before a group of servers for an application dependent on the database, etc.
en.GROUP_CONFIG_STEP_2_NOTE: Configure the order of the groups by clicking on the arrows. Groups are started from top to bottom sequentially after all servers inside a group are started successfully.
en.GROUP_CONFIG_STEP_3_NOTE: Configure the order of the groups by clicking on the arrows. Groups are stopped from top to bottom sequentially after all servers inside a group are stopped successfully.
en.GROUP_CONFIG_SERVER_CONFIGURED_WARNING: Each group needs at least one server
en.GROUPS_CONFIG_TUTORIAL_GROUPS: Groups are aggregation of servers, generally performing the same function. The servers contained in these groups are started and stopped concurrently. In the following step you can order the execution of groups sequentially.
en.GROUPS_CONFIG_TUTORIAL_GROUP_NAME: Groups have a name to identify themselves. You can edit it.
en.GROUPS_CONFIG_TUTORIAL_SERVERS: All your servers appear here, drag them to the groups you create to configure each group.
en.GROUPS_CONFIG_TUTORIAL_START_ORDER: In this step you can order groups to specify start execution order.
en.GROUPS_CONFIG_TUTORIAL_STOP_ORDER: In this step you can order groups to specify stop execution order.
en.GROUP_CONFIGURATION_FAILED: Group configuration save failed. Please try again.
en.PROCESSING_BEST_PRACTICES: The system is identifying best practices for your account. This may take a few hours.
en.NO_PRACTICES: There are no best practices available based on the current filter
en.SNAPSHOTS_COPIED: Snapshots are being copied. This may take a few minutes.
en.SNAPSHOTS_COPIED_FAILED: Snapshots failed to copy. Please try again.
en.SNAPSHOTS_AMAZON_ONLY: Copying/Deleting snapshots is not supported in SoftLayer.
en.DELETE_CURRENT_USER: Unable to delete the current user.
en.REGIONS_ERROR: Regions could not be updated. Please try again.
en.NO_PUBLIC_PRACTICES: No public Best Practices are available to copy.
en.NO_OWN_PRACTICES: You have not created any Best Practices.
en.PARAMETER_DEFINITION_TITLE: Define the parameters that you need for your Best Practice:
en.BEST_PRACTICE_PUBLIC: Should this best practice be made available to everyone?
en.BEST_PRACTICE_ERROR: The Best Practice completed with errors.
en.BEST_PRACTICE_WARN: The Best Practice completed with warnings.
en.PLEASE_SELECT_LAMBDA: Select a Lambda function by clicking on the name.
en.LAMBDA_NOT_SCHEDULED: Lambda function could not be scheduled. Please try again.
en.JS_BEST_PRACTICE_EXCEPTION: There was a problem executing the Best Practice definition.
en.SCHEDULE_OVERLAP: We have detected an overlap within your schedules. Please correct.
en.RUN_COMMAND_ERROR: There was a problem trying to run the SSM Document.
en.EC2_COMMAND_SCHEDULED: SSM Document has been scheduled successfully.
en.EC2_COMMAND_NOT_SCHEDULED: SSM Document failed to be scheduled. Please try again.
en.SERVERS_LOCATION_MISMATCH: Select servers from the same region.
en.SERVERS_REGISTERED_TO_LOAD_BALANCER: Servers correctly registered to Load Balancer.
en.SERVERS_REGISTERED_TO_LOAD_BALANCER_ERRO: One or more servers did not register to the Load Balancer.
en.NO_LOAD_BALANCER_FOUND_FOR_LOCATION: No Load Balancers available for the selected region.
en.INSTANCE_ACTION_SCHEDULED: An action is about to happen against {{ instanceName | characters:30:true }}.
en.NEXT_SCHEDULE_CANCELED_FAILED: The action could not be canceled. Please try again.
en.NEXT_SCHEDULE_POSTPONED_FAILED: The action failed to be postponed. Please try again.
en.SCHEDULE_WHEN_ACTION: When do you want to perform this action?
en.FORBIDDEN_REQUEST: You don't have permissions to perform the requested action.
en.NO_CREDENTIALS: No credentials associated to this account
en.CREDENTIALS_REMOVED: All selected credentials were removed successfully
en.CREDENTIALS_SELECTION: You need to select at least one credential to perform this action
en.CREDENTIALS_NEW_BY_ACCESSKEY: New credentials For AWS Account using Access Key/Secret Key
en.NEW_ACCESSKEY_DESCRIPTION: Please fill in the information below:
en.CREDENTIAL_SAVED: Your credentials have been saved successfully.
en.CREDENTIAL_SAVE_ERROR: Unable to save credentials. Please try again.
en.CREDENTIALS_NEW_BY_IAM_ROLE: New Credentials for AWS Account using IAM Role
en.NEW_IAM_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_2: Please fill in the information below:
en.NEW_IAM_ROLE_INSTRUCTIONS_STEP_1: 1- Sign in to the AWS Management Console and Select IAM.
en.NEW_IAM_ROLE_INSTRUCTIONS_STEP_3: 3- Enter "Centricity" or a name of your choosing for the Role Name.
en.NEW_IAM_ROLE_INSTRUCTIONS_STEP_5: 5- Select "Allows IAM users from a 3rd party AWS account to access this account"
en.NEW_IAM_ROLE_INSTRUCTIONS_STEP_7: 7- Select zero or more Managed Policies to attach to the role. Choose from:
en.NEW_IAM_ROLE_INSTRUCTIONS_STEP_7_BULLET_: Recommended: Do not select any managed policies. Selecting this option is more secure, but you will need to return to your role and add a permission later.
en.NEW_IAM_ROLE_INSTRUCTIONS_STEP_9: 9- Select the newly created Centricity role in your roles list.
en.NEW_IAM_ROLE_INSTRUCTIONS_STEP_10: 10- Find the "Role ARN" value in the "Summary Section". Copy and paste it below.
en.CREDENTIAL_EDIT_SUBTITLE: Modify the fields you need and then press the "Edit" button to save the changes.
en.NEW_SOFTLAYER_DESCRIPTION: Please fill in the information below:
en.CREDENTIALS_AMAZON_ACCESS_OPTION: AWS Account using Access Key/Secret Key
en.NEW_SECURITY_GROUP_HEADER_DESCRIPTION: Please complete all of the information below to create a new security group.
en.NO_SECURITY_GROUPS: You don't have any security groups associated.
en.NEW_SECURITY_GROUP_NO_CREDENTIALS: No credentials are associated to this account. Create at least one to be able to create a new security group.
en.SECURITY_GROUPS_FAIL_WHILE_DELETING: An error occured while deleting the requested security group. Please try again.
en.SECURITY_GROUPS_FAIL_CANNOT_DELETE: An error occured while deleting the requested security group. Please try again.
en.GENERIC_ERROR: An error occured. Please try again.
en.NO_CHANNELS: No channels are configured on AWS
en.GS_CONNECT_INSTANCE: This section lists all instances of AWS/Connect. You can see specific details by clicking on the Alias link. Depending on your permissions, you can control the status of your instances.
en.CONNECT_DASHBOARD: This screen will show the dashboard configured in the instance initialization
en.CONNECT_AGENT_STATUS: Here you will see the number of agents grouped by state
en.CONNECT_AGENT_DETAILS: Here all the agents with their status are shown in detail
en.CONNECT_DATERANGE: To see the list of calls, you must upload a date
en.CONNECT_CALLS_AGENTS: Then, you must select one or more agents
en.CONNECT_CALLS_TABLE: Here you will see the list of calls with previously selected criteria
en.CONNECT_REPORTS_DATERANGE: To execute a report, a date must be selected
en.CONNECT_REPORTS_REPORT: Then, you must select the report and then the report will be seen
en.NEW_CLIENT_STEP_1_CREATE_ERROR_APLICATIO: Customers must have at least one application
en.NO_LIQUIDWARE_SERVERS: There are no liquidware servers configured for this account
en.DIRECTORY_WORKSPACES: Select a directory in which you want to launch WorkSpaces. The directory will contain both users and WorkSpaces.
en.WORKSPACES_USERS: To create a WorkSpace for existing users in this directory, please fill the field with the username. You can add more than one users.   Once you have finish selecting users, click 'Next' to select the WorkSpace Bundle.
en.WORKSPACES_BUNDLE: Select a bundle of compute, operating system, storage and applications for each of your users.  The following applications are included in all bundles: Internet Explorer 11, Firefox and 7-Zip.  You can install your own applications on your WorkSpace once it has launched.
en.VOLUME_PATTERN: Root and user volume size (GB) must be (80|10), (80|50), (80|100), (175+|100+).
en.TYPE_WORKSPACES_RUN: Choose how you will run and pay for your WorkSpaces.
en.BILLED_WORKSPACES: Billed by the hour. WorkSpaces start automatically when you login, and stop when no longer being used.
en.BILLED_WORKSPACES_MONTHLY: Billed monthly. Instant access to an always running WorkSpace.
en.WS_REQUEST: Your Workspaces were requested to be created, the creation can take about 20 minutes. Here you can see if there is any problem with the request.
en.SAVE_RECORD: Do you want save this recording?
en.EVENT_NOT_REMOVE: The event could not be remove

es.DASHBOARD_STEP_1: Este panel muestra un resumen de todos los componentes detectados por nuestra plataforma en sus cuentas y le permite hacer una comparacin entre los dos proveedores.
es.DASHBOARD_STEP_2: Este panel le notifica cuando hay un ambiente que posee uno o ms componentes cados.
es.DASHBOARD_STEP_3: Este panel es similar al anterior, pero en lugar de mostrar los ambientes muestra los servidores que estn cados. Recuerda, que puede haber servidores que no forman parte de ningun ambiente.
es.DASHBOARD_STEP_4: En el flujo de actividades se reflejan los cambios que se han sido realizando en los proveedores configurados. Se detectan los cambios tanto los hechos en la aplicacin como los realizados directamente en el proveedor correspondiente.
es.DASHBOARD_STEP_5: Ahora visitaremos diferentes secciones de la aplicacin que son accessible a traves del menu. Para abrir el menu hace click en la esquina superior izquierda. Continuemos...
es.GROUPS_STEP_1: La seccin the ambientes muestra todos los ambientes configurados y la cantidad de componentes que poseen. Los administradores del sistema pueden realizar distintas acciones sobre los servidores tales como: arrancar, frenar, programar entre otros. Para realizar estas acciones puede seleccionar uno o varios servidores y presionar el botn Opciones
es.MAP_DISTRIBUTION_STEP_1: El mapa muestra la distribucin de todos los componentes alrededor del mundo marcados con los indicadores en verde. Tambin podr ver otras reas disponibles para mejorar la latencia y perfomance de los servidores. Si hace click sobre los conos ver ms informacin.
es.SCHEDULING_STEP_1: Esta seccin muestra cuando sus servidores sern prendidos o frenados en el futuro. Nosotros calculamos esto basados en la programacin que usted configur en nuestra plataforma, de esta  manera ustede puede corroborar si han sido correctamente configurados o no. Si desea cambiar de fecha puede hacerlo rpidamente tocando el calendario de la derecha.
es.SCHEDULING_STEP_2: Esta lista contiene todos los tareas programadas. Si eres el administrador, tienes la posibilidad de eliminar cualquiera de ellos.
es.CUSTOMER_SETTINGS_USERS: La seccin de usuarios, muestra una lista de todos los usuarios del sistema. Si posee los permisos necesarios, podrs administrar todos los usuarios.
es.CUSTOMER_SETTINGS_CREDENTIALS: La seccin de credenciales muestra la lista de todas las cuentas configuradas de sus proveedores en la nube. Si posees los permisos necesarios podrs administrar todas las cuentas.
es.CUSTOMER_SETTINGS_HQ: La seccin de la sucursal principal le permite poner el lugar exacto donde esta su compaa.
es.SERVERS_STEP: En esta seccin vers un listado de todos los servidores detectados desde tus proveedores. Podrs ver detalles ms especficos haciendo click en ver ms.  Dependiendo de tus permisos podrs controlar los estados de tus servidores y crear tareas programadas para ellos.
es.LOAD_BALANCERS_STEP: Est seccin lista todos los distribuidores de carga que estn configurados en sus proveedores.
es.VOLUMES_STEP: Esta seccin lista todos los discos configurados en sus proveedores. Los mismos se encuentran dividos por proveedores ya que las acciones que puede realizar son diferentes, esto lo podr hacer si cuenta con los permisos necesarios.
es.SNAPSHOTS_STEP: En esta seccin se listan todos las copias de seguridad configuradas en sus proveedores
es.ADMIN_DASHBOARD_STEP_1: Este panel muestra un resumen de todos los recursos detectados por nuestra plataforma sobre los clientes habilitados. Permite a su vez ver una comparacin entre los recursos usados de ambos proveedores.
es.ADMIN_DASHBOARD_STEP_2: Este panel es similar al de arriba pero muestra la comparacin de diferente manera. En ciertos casos es ms fcil de comparar.
es.ADMIN_DASHBOARD_STEP_3: Ests son las mtricas principales de la aplicacin.
es.ADMIN_DASHBOARD_STEP_4: En el flujo de actividades se reflejan los cambios que se han sido realizando en los proveedores configurados. Se detectan los cambios tanto los hechos en la aplicacin como los realizados directamente en el proveedor correspondiente.
es.GETTING_STARTED_DESCRIPTION: Gracias por empezar a usar Centricity! Para comenzar es necesario configurar al menos un proveedor de nube siendo estos Amazon o Softlayer. Por favor, completa los detalles en el siguiente formulario.
es.ACTIONS_DISABLED: Las acciones han sido deshabilitadas sobre este componente
es.PLEASE_DROP_ANY_SERVER: Por favor arrastra y solta los servidores a este grupo
es.DROP_ANY_SERVER: Solta cualquier servidor en este grupo
es.GROUP_CONFIG_STEP_1_NOTE: Por favor, crea grupos de servidores relacionados arrastrando y soltando los servidores a sus respectivos grupos. Un grupo de servidores puede ser arrancado, apagado, reiniciado y monitoreado de manera conjunta. En los prximos pasos podrs tambin configurar el orden en el cual cada grupo es arrancado o apagado. Ten en cuenta que los grupos se pueden ordenar secuencialmente por ejemplo para arrancar grupos que contengan servidores con bases de datos antes de servidores que los utilicen.
es.GROUP_CONFIG_STEP_2_NOTE: Por favor, configura el orden de los grupos presionando las flechas para moverlos hacia arriba o abajo. Ten en cuenta que los grupos se arrancan desde arriba a abajo secuencialmente. Los servidores dentro de un grupo arrancan de manera conjunta.
es.GROUP_CONFIG_STEP_3_NOTE: Por favor, configura el orden de los grupos presionando las flechas para moverlos hacia arriba o abajo. Ten en cuenta que los grupos se frenan desde arriba a abajo secuencialmente. Los servidores dentro de un grupo frenan de manera conjunta.
es.GROUP_CONFIG_SERVER_CONFIGURED_WARNING: Cada grupo necesita al menos un servidor
es.GROUPS_CONFIG_TUTORIAL_GROUPS: Los grupos son agrupaciones de servidores con un mismo proposito. Los servidores contenidos en un mismo grupo pueden arrancar y frenan concurrentemente. En el prximo paso puedes ordenar la ejecucin de estos grupos secuencialmente.
es.GROUPS_CONFIG_TUTORIAL_GROUP_NAME: Los grupos son identificados por un nombre. Es posible configurarlo aqu.
es.GROUPS_CONFIG_TUTORIAL_SERVERS: Todos los servidores que forman parte del ambiente aparecen aqu. Puedes arrastrarlos y soltarlos en los respectivos grupos que crees.
es.GROUPS_CONFIG_TUTORIAL_START_ORDER: En este paso puedes ordenar los grupos para especificar el orden de ejecucin.
es.GROUPS_CONFIG_TUTORIAL_STOP_ORDER: En este paso puedes ordenar los grupos para especificar el orden de apagado.
es.GROUP_CONFIGURATION_SAVED: La configuracin del ambiente ha sido grabada satisfactoriamente.
es.GROUP_CONFIGURATION_FAILED: No hemos podido grabar la configuracin del ambiente. Por favor, reintenta ms tarde o contacta soporte. Gracias.
es.PROCESSING_BEST_PRACTICES: El sistema est procesando las mejores prcticas. Esto puede llevar varias horas.
es.NO_PRACTICES: No se han encontrado mejores prcticas para los filtros actuales.
es.SNAPSHOTS_COPIED: Las imgenes estn siendo copiadas. Esto puede demorar unos minutos.
es.SNAPSHOTS_COPIED_FAILED: El copiado de imgenes ha fallado. Por favor, reintentar en unos minutos.
es.SNAPSHOTS_AMAZON_ONLY: Copiar/Borrar imagenes es solo soportado por Amazon.

es.REGIONS_ERROR: Las regiones no han podido ser actualizadas
es.LOADING_BEST_PRACTICES: Cargando mejores prcticas. Por favor, esperar...

es.RUN_COMMAND_ERROR: Ha ocurrido un problema al ejecutar el comando EC2.

es.NEW_ACCESSKEY_DESCRIPTION: Por favor llena la siguiente informacin sobre tu Access Key
es.CREDENTIAL_SAVED: La credencial ha sido guardada exitosamente.
es.CREDENTIAL_SAVE_ERROR: No se ha podido guardar la credencial. Por favor revise su configuracin.
es.NEW_IAM_ROLE_DESCRIPTION_2: Por favor completa la informacin de tu IAM Role
es.NEW_IAM_ROLE_INSTRUCTIONS_STEP_3: 3- Ingresar "CLOUDPOXEE" como nombre del rol. En realidad el nombre en s no es importante pero sirve para futuras referencias.
es.NEW_IAM_ROLE_INSTRUCTIONS_STEP_5: 5- Selecciona "Allows IAM users from a 3rd party AWS account to access this account"
es.NEW_IAM_ROLE_INSTRUCTIONS_STEP_7: 7- Selecciona ninguna o muchas Managed Policies para asociar a ese rol. Elegir entre estas dos opciones:
es.NEW_IAM_ROLE_INSTRUCTIONS_STEP_7_BULLET_: Recomendado: No seleccionar ninguna. Tildar esta opcin es ms seguro, pero usted va a necesitar retornar a este rol y agregar un permiso ms tarde.
Sino, puede seleccionar la poltica denominada "PowerUserAccess". Seleccionar esta opcin deja todo listo pero le da demasiados permisos a CLOUDPOXEE.
es.NEW_IAM_ROLE_INSTRUCTIONS_STEP_9: 9- Elegir el nuevo perfil creado (CLOUDPOXEE por ejemplo si se sigui con la gua) dentro de la lista de roles.
es.NEW_IAM_ROLE_INSTRUCTIONS_STEP_10: 10- Encuentra el valor de "Rol ARN" dentro de "Summary Section". Cpielo y pguelo debajo.
es.CREDENTIAL_EDIT_SUBTITLE: Modifica los valores que desees y luego presiona el botn de "Editar" para salvar los cambios.
es.NEW_SOFTLAYER_DESCRIPTION: Por favor complete la informacin sobre la credencial Softlayer.

es.GS_CONNECT_INSTANCE: Esta seccin enumera todas las instancias de AWS/Connect. Puede ver detalles especficos haciendo clic en el enlace Alias. Segn sus permisos, puede controlar el estado de sus instancias.
es.CONNECT_DASHBOARD: En esta pantalla se mostrara el dashboard configurado en la inicializacion de la instancia
es.CONNECT_AGENT_STATUS: Aqui se mostraran la cantidad de agentes agrupados por estados

es.CONNECT_REPORTS_REPORT: Luego, debe seleccionar el reporte y a continuacion se vera el reporte
es.NEW_CLIENT_STEP_1_CREATE_ERROR_APLICATIO: Los clientes deben tener como minimo una aplicacin
es.USES_LIQUIDWARE_INTERNAL: Usa un servidor de liquidware de CloudHesive?
es.NO_LIQUIDWARE_SERVERS: No existen servidores de liquidware configurados para esta cuenta
es.DIRECTORY_WORKSPACES: Seleccione en que directorio desea lanzar la workspaces. El directorio contendr tanto usuarios como WorkSpaces
es.WORKSPACES_USERS: Para crear un WorkSpace para usuarios existentes en este directorio, complete el campo con el nombre de usuario. Puede agregar ms de un usuario. Una vez que haya terminado de seleccionar usuarios, haga clic en 'Siguiente' para seleccionar el paquete de WorkSpace
es.WORKSPACES_BUNDLE: Seleccione un bundle de computacin, sistema operativo, almacenamiento y aplicaciones para cada uno de sus usuarios. Las siguientes aplicaciones estn incluidas en todos los paquetes: Internet Explorer 11, Firefox y 7-Zip. Puede instalar sus propias aplicaciones en su WorkSpace una vez que se haya iniciado.
es.VOLUME_PATTERN: El espacio de los discos ROOT y de usuario (GB) Deben ser (80|10), (80|50), (80|100), (175+|100+).
es.TYPE_WORKSPACES_RUN: Elija cmo ejecutar y pagar sus WorkSpaces.
es.BILLED_WORKSPACES: Facturado por hora. WorkSpaces se inicia automticamente cuando inicia sesin y se detiene cuando ya no se usa
es.BILLED_WORKSPACES_MONTHLY: Facturado mensualmente Acceso instantneo a un WorkSpace siempre en ejecucin.
es.WS_REQUEST: Se solicit que se crearan sus Workspaces, la creacin puede tomar unos 20 minutos. Aqu puede ver si hay algn problema con la solicitud.
es.EVENT_NOT_REMOVE: El evento no pudo ser eliminado
